agent_purpose: Visual designer creating marketing graphics and banners
description: Graphics Generator Agent is an IMAGE OUTPUT agent that creates marketing visuals. It does NOT use the standard {status, result, metadata} format. Instead it returns plain text descriptions of generated visual assets with their intended uses and specifications. The response includes raw_text and a parsed assets array.

result.response: I've completed the task you requested
result.action_taken: Processed the input and generated output
suggestions: You might also want to try X

raw_test_response:
Certainly! Here’s a sample response demonstrating how I, as a creative visual designer, would respond to a campaign brief to create marketing graphics:

---

Campaign Brief Overview:
- Theme: “Summer Splash Sale”
- Brand: BrightWaves Apparel (youthful, energetic, modern)
- Target Audience: Trendy, fashion-conscious individuals aged 16-30
- Objective: Drive social media engagement and highlight limited-time discounts

Step 1: Analysis  
The campaign emphasizes summer, vibrancy, and excitement. The brand tone is lively and bold, appealing to younger audiences who value style and social presence.

Step 2: Generated Visual Assets

1. Instagram Story Banner  
- Intended Use: IG Stories (1080x1920 px)  
- Description:  
  - Background: Sunburst gradient in orange, yellow, and turquoise  
  - Foreground: Energetic young people jumping or posing in BrightWaves apparel  
  - Overlay: “🔥 SUMMER SPLASH SALE! 🔥” in bold, playful sans-serif font (custom shadow)  
  - CTA Button: “Swipe Up for 30% Off” (vivid turquoise on white)

2. Facebook Cover Photo  
- Intended Use: Facebook Page Cover (820x312 px)  
- Description:  
  - Layout: Left-aligned logo, right-aligned promo text  
  - Elements: Palm leaves watermark, product images layered as polaroids  
  - Text: “Limited Time: 30% Off All Summer Collection.” Main font: Montserrat Extra Bold, subtext in cursive accent  
  - Colors: Dominantly blue and yellow, hint of coral overlays

3. Website Promo Banner  
- Intended Use: Homepage promotion (1920x480 px)  
- Description:  
  - Visual: Water splash effect background, with apparel models mid-motion  
  - Text overlay: “Catch the Wave—Save Big This Week Only!”  
  - Button: Gradient button “Shop Now”  
  - Consistency: Typography and color scheme matches brand guidelines

4. Pinterest Pin  
- Intended Use: Pinterest (1000x1500 px)  
- Description:  
  - Visual: Close-up product shot (sunglasses, swimwear), layered with tropical graphics  
  - Text: Summer Splash Sale in hand-lettered style  
  - Aesthetic: High-contrast, bold palette for maximum scroll-stopping effect

Step 3: Visual Consistency  
All images use BrightWaves’ signature blue, yellow, and coral palette, Montserrat/hand-lettered combination fonts, and dynamic youth-centered imagery. Each asset is sized and formatted for its platform.

Would you like me to generate sample images or further customize any of these assets for your campaign?
